results.description: Fifa tells Cardiff City they face a ban on signing players for three transfer windows in the dispute over the transfer of striker Emiliano Sala.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff face transfer ban over Sala row
results.title: Emiliano Sala: Cardiff City face Fifa transfer ban over fee dispute

results.description: Cardiff City have been told to pay the first instalment of £5.3m to Nantes for striker Emiliano Sala, who died in a plane crash.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff must pay first £5.3m Sala instalment
results.title: Emiliano Sala: Fifa rules Cardiff must pay first instalment of £5.3m to Nantes

altText: A Cardiff tribute to Emiliano Sala

results.description: Fifa has given Cardiff City and Nantes until 5 September to reach a settlement in the dispute over the payment of Emiliano Sala's transfer fee.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff & Nantes given Sala fee date
results.title: Emiliano Sala: Cardiff City and Nantes given transfer fee date by Fifa

results.description: French side Nantes take Nigeria winger Moses Simon on loan from Spanish club Levante.

results.description: The poisonous gas can cause "dizziness, unconsciousness and death," a report says.
results.shortTitle: Sala and plane pilot 'exposed to carbon monoxide'

results.description: Family and friends of Emiliano Sala say they want someone to be held accountable for his death.
results.shortTitle: Sala was 'abandoned' for fatal flight

thumbnail.altText: Picture of Emiliano Sala and his mother Mercedes on a beach. It was the last time she saw her son

results.description: The parents of footballer Emiliano Sala talk of their pain after his plane crash death.
results.shortTitle: 'They left Sala alone like a dog'
results.title: Emiliano Sala's father: 'They left him alone like a dog'

results.description: Emiliano Sala's father suffered a heart attack at his home in Argentina in the early hours.
results.shortTitle: Sala's dad dies three months after son
results.title: Emiliano Sala's father dies three months after son is killed

results.description: Cardiff City says it will insist intermediaries book only commercial flights for player transfers.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff's flight pledge after Sala crash
results.title: Emiliano Sala: Cardiff City calls for commercial transfer flights

results.description: Paris St-Germain miss the chance to win the Ligue 1 title at the third attempt as they lose 3-2 to Nantes.
results.shortTitle: PSG blow title chance for third time
results.title: Paris St-Germain lose 3-2 to Nantes and once again miss chance to win Ligue 1 title

results.description: Paris St-Germain set up a French Cup final against Rennes after easing past 10-man Nantes in the semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: PSG beat Nantes to reach cup final
results.title: PSG 3-0 Nantes: Thomas Tuchel's side reach French Cup final

results.description: Cardiff City want direct talks with Nantes in an effort to solve the dispute over the £15m transfer fee for plane crash victim Emiliano Sala.

results.description: Cardiff City football are set to tell Fifa the deal to buy Emiliano Sala from Nantes for £15m was not legally binding.
